metadata.name: THE CALL OF ADVENTURE
metadata.description:
"The Call throws the Ordinary World off balance, and establishes the stakes involved if the challenge is rejected.

The Call to Adventure can take a multitude of forms, including: a message or announcement  a sudden storm, the arrival of the villain, a death, an abduction, a manâ€™s dying words... The Hero may need a Succession of Calls before finally realizing that a challenge must be met, or that his only means of escape is the Special World. Many times the Hero needs to choose between two Conflicting Calls..."

-Christopher Vogler
